Posts.EditableText: I made this game for about 3 weeks and it's finally done.  Its been tested a lot and I believe it's all fixed up.  There's a few similarities to the game Mansion which I didn't actually play until I finished my own game so I don't want anyone to think I plagerized in any way.  Anyhoo, you can download it from [url:3edun01i]http://www.savefile.com/projects.php?pid=822798[/url:3edun01i].  Enjoy!
